title: HPE security advisory (AV25-794)
description: On November 30, 2025, HPE published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: HPE Superdome Flex 280 Server  versions prior to 2.05.12
HPE Compute Scale-up Server 3200  versions prior to 1.60.88
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
